title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 296/88 of 1 February 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 redefining the destinaton zones for export refunds or levies and for certain export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 296/88
of 1 February 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 redefining the destinaton zones for export refunds or levies and for certain export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 February 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 377, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 166, 25. 6. 1976, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 377, 31. 12. 1987, p. 15.
(5) OJ No L 134, 28. 5. 1977, p. 53.
(6) OJ No L 144, 4. 6. 1987, p. 14.
